title: Eat The Rich Before They Eat Us, They (Robots) Took Our Jobs 12.4.17
itunes:title: Eat The Rich Before They Eat Us, They (Robots) Took Our Jobs 12.4.17
description:
In episode 40, Jack & Miles are joined comedian Josh Androsky to discuss Tina Fey, the tax bill that just passed, Trump's tweet about Michael Flynn, a break down of wealth distribution in America, the future of automation, college football, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
